data.message: How do I go about reporting that my facebook account has been compromised I have got about 10 people with them trying to get me a government grant and you have to pay 250.00 dollars by western union. They're using the people that I know family and friends. What do I do?

replies.message: Hey Mary. If you think your account was hacked, please secure it immediately by visiting: http://bit.ly/23U2tMt. -Rey
dont do it someone scaming you dont pay one dime

Facebook picture ID's! your no police who can say give me your Id As amatter of fact remind me in seven day I'll Sure as heck remind you face book in seven days, don't ask me for any identity cards I'll let you know if I have My own personal identity and or nick name I would like you to be aware of or know about YOU'LL KNOW ABOUT IT!What people do in the privacy of their day to day and name they have obliged them in or out of a face book log in session is privlaged information your overstepping your reach!
